::Zardus/FZ::

Zardus looks over at Delta, smiling slightly. "I have ways," he 
replies, his wrist comp beeping with a report of gunfire near the new 
ship.

He looks up from his wrist comp to Deemos. "Can you and your troops 
go to the Oblitercons' position and back them up? They might be 
running into some trouble.

He then recieves Diamond's transition, replying to it. "I might have 
a job for you, yes.... How good are you at getting in and out of 
places undetected? Places that might be very heavily guarded."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ shakes his head. "That won't me neccessary, no."

He raises his head as he recieves an update on Zardus' mind from the 
IF, heading off toward the exit.

"Follow me, you might be needed outside."
